member.name: EVENTMSG
member.summary: Contains information about a hardware message sent to the system message queue. This structure is used to store message information for the JournalPlaybackProc callback function.

member.name: EVENTMSG.paramL
member.summary: Additional information about the message. The exact meaning depends on themessage value.

member.name: EVENTMSG.paramH
member.summary: Additional information about the message. The exact meaning depends on themessage value.

member.name: EVENTMSG.time
member.summary: The time at which the message was posted.

member.name: EVENTMSG.hwnd
member.summary: A handle to the window to which the message was posted.
